4183.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They (will) say,|123|136|101$أَوَلَمْ تَكُ|`Did there not|115|142|15180$تَأْتِيكُمْ|come to you|103|130|7051$رُسُلُكُم|your Messengers|131|158|15181$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِۖ|with clear proofs?`|146|159|880$قَالُواْ|They (will) say,|123|139|101$بَلَىٰۚ|`Yes.`|65|96|772$قَالُواْ|They (will) say,|123|154|101$فَٱدْعُواْۗ|`Then call,|93|124|15100$وَمَا|but not|69|100|46$دُعَـٰٓؤُاْ|(is) the call|96|112|15182$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|(of) the disbelievers|153|208|364$إِلَّا|except|65|176|86$فِى|in|48|159|89$ضَلَـٰلٍ|error.`|77|132|3468$

4184.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed We,|96|107|120$لَنَنصُرُ|We will surely help|142|165|15183$رُسُلَنَا|Our Messengers|125|148|8071$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|141|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|105|84$فِى|in|48|59|89$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|the life|82|94|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|136|818$وَيَوْمَ|and (on the) Day|134|158|819$يَقُومُ|(when) will stand|134|158|2472$ٱلْأَشْهَـٰدُ|the witnesses,|117|129|8422$

4185.verse: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|104|1057$لَا|not|42|76|30$يَنفَعُ|will benefit|91|125|1422$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|157|377$مَعْذِرَتُهُمْۖ|their excuse,|106|140|13784$وَلَهُمُ|and for them|105|122|14727$ٱللَّعْنَةُ|(is) the curse|110|157|9442$وَلَهُمْ|and for them|105|199|71$سُوٓءُ|(is the) worst|111|205|7574$ٱلدَّارِ|home.|68|115|9434$

4186.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|132|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|118|509$مُوسَى|Musa|83|123|499$ٱلْهُدَىٰ|the guidance|106|146|1113$وَأَوْرَثْنَا|and We caused to inherit|187|207|6767$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(the) Children of Israel|170|378|10567$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book,|88|296|451$

4187.verse: هُدًى|A guide|69|112|33$وَذِكْرَىٰ|and a reminder|118|205|6244$لِأُوْلِى|for those|80|167|15184$ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ|(of) understanding.|148|191|1762$

4188.verse: فَٱصْبِرْ|So be patient;|116|134|8535$إِنَّ|indeed,|68|105|58$وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Promise of Allah|163|200|8195$حَقٌّ|(is) true.|79|116|3076$وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ|And ask forgiveness|152|170|3444$لِذَنۢبِكَ|for your sin|95|122|15185$وَسَبِّحْ|and glorify|89|143|2842$بِحَمْدِ|(the) praise|98|152|9865$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|166|1322$بِٱلْعَشِىِّ|in the evening|114|141|2843$وَٱلْإِبْكَـٰرِ|and the morning.|132|132|2844$

4189.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|81|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|110|20$يُجَـٰدِلُونَ|dispute|101|122|9381$فِىٓ|concerning|92|113|89$ءَايَـٰتِ|(the) Signs|94|115|2041$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|102|2$بِغَيْرِ|without|70|81|612$سُلْطَـٰنٍ|any authority|109|117|6529$أَتَـٰهُمْۙ|(which) came to them,|172|188|5542$إِن|not|44|60|225$فِى|(is) in|58|74|89$صُدُورِهِمْ|their breasts|113|129|6397$إِلَّا|but|42|58|86$كِبْرٌ|greatness,|90|98|15186$مَّا|not|42|57|262$هُم|they|50|81|49$بِبَـٰلِغِيهِۚ|(can) reach it.|117|148|15187$فَٱسْتَعِذْ|So seek refuge|119|150|7103$بِٱللَّهِۖ|in Allah.|72|103|79$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed He,|92|123|396$هُوَ|He|48|63|298$ٱلسَّمِيعُ|(is) the All-Hearer|139|355|1170$ٱلْبَصِيرُ|the All-Seer.|104|320|10212$

4190.verse: لَخَلْقُ|Surely, (the) creation|164|170|15188$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|144|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|123|352$أَكْبَرُ|(is) greater|95|107|1897$مِنْ|than|50|62|53$خَلْقِ|(the) creation|113|119|1416$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the mankind,|135|146|75$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|100|952$أَكْثَرَ|most|64|86|2155$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the people|120|142|75$لَا|(do) not|75|97|30$يَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|103|115$

4191.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|88|46$يَسْتَوِى|are equal|87|119|4341$ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ|the blind|90|122|5615$وَٱلْبَصِيرُ|and the seeing|118|150|5616$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|150|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|98|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|111|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds|125|163|239$وَلَا|and not|71|109|25$ٱلْمُسِىٓءُۚ|the evildoer.|103|141|15189$قَلِيلاً|Little|63|101|433$مَّا|(is) what|80|99|262$تَتَذَكَّرُونَ|you take heed.|120|120|5771$

4183.verse: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."

4184.verse: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -

4185.verse: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.

4186.verse: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture

4187.verse: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.

4188.verse: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.

4189.verse: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.

4190.verse: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.

4191.verse: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.
